title: Nourshing Cream - Almond Milk
description: The protein enriched almond-milk nourishing cream is supplemented by an effective base to give excellent glow to the skin.
advantages: (-) The cream is enriched with Almond, Milk and Vitamins
(-) Useful for all types of skin
(-) Almond oil helps in excellent massaging
(-) Very effective for skin protection and Nourishment
(-) It can be used as all season cream
how-to-use: (-) Wash your face with luke warm water.  Splash your face with cold water and gently pat it dry with a soft towel.
(-) Place a tiny amount of cream onto your ring finger and dab the cream onto your face in small dots.
(-) Gently massage the cream into your skin using small, upward, circular motions. Never drag downward on your skin.
(-) Be sure to leave half inch margin around your eyes as this area is very sensitive.
(-) Wait for your skin to absorb the cream before getting dressed or putting on makeup.
